TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit MessageQueuePermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class MessageQueuePermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class MessageQueuePermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Позволяет контролировать разрешения на доступ к коду для обмена сообщениями.

span.span: Allows control of code access permissions for messaging.

param.name: target

span.span: This new permission object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.
